LanguageData.StargateMod_Stargate.label: arcane portal
LanguageData.StargateMod_Stargate.description: An ancient portal used to transport people or resources between ley-line nexus points.\n\n"By the time you get to the other side, you're frozen stiff. Like you'd just been through a blizzard... naked."
LanguageData.StargateMod_OrlinStargate.label: makeshift arcane portal
LanguageData.StargateMod_OrlinStargate.description: A portal used to transport people or resources between ley-line nexus points.\n\n"This portal in particular was made using easily available resources, but is quite unstable and unreliable, and also requires an external energy source. It is both too weak and too small to have an arcane barrier. It has an integrated control crystal. Make sure to get out of the way before it finishes attuning..."
LanguageData.StargateMod_AdvancedStargate.label: mysterious arcane portal
LanguageData.StargateMod_AdvancedStargate.description: A portal used to transport people or resources between ley-line nexus points.\n\n"This portal is identical in nearly every way to a makeshift arcane portal. It has an integrated control crystal. Make sure to get out of the way before it finishes attuning..."
LanguageData.StargateMod_DialHomeDevice.label: control crystal
LanguageData.StargateMod_DialHomeDevice.description: An ancient crystal used to control a portal.\n\nThe crystal is linked to a portal allowing entry of arcane glyphs to target the portal on a specific ley-line nexus point.
LanguageData.StargateMod_GlyphScrap.label: arcane glyph slab
LanguageData.StargateMod_GlyphScrap.description: A mysterious cracked stone with arcane symbols engraved on it.\n\n"These symbols also appear of the control crystals!"
LanguageData.StargateMod_IrisInstallKit.label: arcane portal barrier
LanguageData.StargateMod_IrisInstallKit.description: An arcane portal barrier ready to protect a portal.\n\n"We have in place an impenetrable shield."
